execution_quality: Good investigative work using appropriate bash commands to examine autorandr profiles, monitor detection, and configuration files. However, no actual edits were made despite the user's follow-up request for a fix.
work_category: Troubleshooting display configuration auto-detection. The agent diagnosed why autorandr wasn't recognizing the docked configuration and identified the root cause.
summary: Agent successfully diagnosed the autorandr configuration issue through systematic investigation, but the task was only half-complete. The user's follow-up request for a specific fix (wildcard configuration) indicates they expected implementation, not just analysis. The agent was on the right track but needed to proceed from diagnosis to solution.
follow_up_pattern: User acknowledged the investigation and issued a specific follow-up request (make it a wildcard), indicating they understood the problem but expected implementation to follow. The new request suggests the prior analysis was useful but incomplete.
